 ∙ Ensure that all drugs, diagnostics, equipment and consumables are available at HWC-SHC as per guidelines.
 ∙ Update records of PW in sub-centre reporting format, RCH register, HMIS (if desktop is available) and ensure 
recording of complete information in MCP cards.
 ∙ Ensure the completeness of data and send timely to the PHC/Block level so that DEO enter data in RCH 
portal timely.
